level.heading: DETERMINATION OF REASONABLE PRICE AND AWARD (ยง 27-1801)

level.text: 1801.1 The contracting officer shall determine that the price to be paid formall purchases made pursuant to this chapter to the successful offeror is fairnd reasonable.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 1476 (February 26, 1988); asmended by Emergency Rulemaking published at 44 DCR 4450 (August 1, 1997)EXPIRED]; as amended by Emergency Rulemaking published at 44 DCR 7181 (November1, 1997) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Emergency Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 1261February 25, 2000) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47CR 9882 (December 15, 2000); as amended by Emergency Rulemaking published at 50CR 3186 (April 25, 2003) [EXPIRED]; Final Rulemaking published at 50 DCR 8179October 3, 2003); as amended by Emergency Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 445January 20, 2006) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR876 (July 21, 2006); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 9558,559 (December 25, 2009); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR716 (June 28, 2013).
